message: Let's start fair.  I'll take the majority, but you get a decent share.  Accept this and we're done!
Let's split it in a way that I think is more fair. I'll take the bigger share this time.
I'm willing to compromise.  Let's split it 60/40, closer to the middle ground.  Accept this and we can both get something good.
I see we're getting closer. I'll take a bit less than before, but still more than you offered.
